name: Business Clicker (itch)
description:
Would you like to feel like the owner of some business of your own? Would you like to develop it and improve it? Would you like to achieve incredible results?

Then you definitely need to try this game!

In it you will be able to make your dreams come true. Develop your small business into a gigantic business empire. Cooperate and trade with global corporations. Produce various goods.

Game features:
✔ develop your business,
✔ trade with corporations,
✔ build and improve factories,
✔ research technology,
✔ open and improve departments in the office,
✔ develop production,
✔ produce goods or buy them,
✔ complete orders,
✔ improve your own AI,
✔ you can also take credits from a bank.
